hero.title: Intelligently Transform Your Dropshipping Store with XpressSEO
hero.subtitle: Behind the scenes, multiple AI specialists work together to deliver optimized content for you to dominate search results.
hero.freeCreditsNote: 3 free credits to get you started.

features.title: Everything you need to grow
features.subtitle: Let AI handle the heavy lifting of SEO while you focus on selling.
features.keywordResearchDescription: Our AI analyzes your niche and finds high-intent keywords your customers are using to search for products.
features.optimizedContentDescription: Generate product descriptions, categories, and blog posts that not only sell but are also loved by search engines.
features.internationalExpansionDescription: Translate and adapt all your SEO content for the target country, reaching a global audience with cultural precision.
